A Minimal Book Example Yihui Xie 2018-10-31 Stat545 0.1 What this is 0.2 Who is this for 0.3 Who are we 0.4 Prerequisites This is a sample book written in Markdown. You can use anything that Pandoc’s Markdown supports, e.g., a math equation \(a^2 + b^2 = c^2\). The bookdown package can be installed from CRAN or Github: install.packages("bookdown") # or the development version # devtools::install_github("rstudio/bookdown") Remember each Rmd file contains one and only one chapter, and a chapter is defined by the first-level heading #. To compile this example to PDF, you need XeLaTeX. You are recommended to install TinyTeX (which includes XeLaTeX): https://yihui.name/tinytex/.
